Hi Hagop,

I hope you're well.
We have received the below from insurer and our credit control team and We hope that you can support with this and finalize in order to prevent any  further inconveniences ?
We look forward to receiving the positive news soon.
Thank you in advance for your usual cooperation.

Best regards,
Kev

Good day Kev,

 

Referring to the subject client, the below was confirmed to Insurer based on my last call with Hogop – MTC, however, we have not received any payment till date.  The account has been blocked, and we are not able to request for any extension, United Fidelity will go for policy cancellation soon if the payment has not been received within this week,  appreciate your assistance in settlement of this payment urgently.
